msg: QPID-798 Added boolean property fully_sync when true a sync is sent after a persistent message is transfered. .

author: arnaudsimon
msg: QPID-796: Added ability to enable/disable message prefetching. Prefetching is controlled through the property max_prefetch, it is turned off when max_prefetch =0. (this is 0.10 code path change)
